about.intro: I am currently a **Master's Degree Candidate** in Computer Science and Technology at **Hangzhou Dianzi University** (Sep 2024 - Present). Previously, I received my Bachelor's degree in Digital Media Technology from Hangzhou Dianzi University (Sep 2019 - June 2023), where I was awarded the Third-class Excellence Scholarship and three School-level Individual Scholarships.
about.research_interests: My research interests include **Data Visualization**, **Human-Computer Interaction**, and **Computer Graphics**. In the era of generative AI, I am particularly excited about integrating AI into visualization and interaction design, as I believe their synergy will drive remarkable innovations.
about.tech_stack: Tech Stack: d3.js, Vue, FastAPI, Figma, and more.
about.job_seeking: I am currently looking for internship opportunities.
